channel.title: What do you like in a game?
channel.description: Let me set the scene : brand new pk server no spawning allowed what features do u like on it - lots of npcs or theiving or smithing or trainging or shops or what ever post here what u like in a game (this is not promotional so no point asking to be an admin or mod)
